venue.name: FINZ SEAFOOD & GRILL Pickering Wharf Salem

item.description:
Let's Explore Salem, MA on the Sunday before Halloween. We will walk around explore a few spots. I know there is free stuff to do and see inside and out.I am getting there early at/before 12 noon to beat the traffic and the crowds. There is a Haunted Happenings Carnival that you can pay to go on rides. People can break off and go to pay haunted and Halloween activities in Salem too although the lines will be super long though! I tend NOT to do those now because I hate waiting! I suggest coming back next week in November to do them if you really want to!

Please note all time are approximate and can change at any point. We’ll do our best to stick to this schedule!

12 noon let’s enjoy a speculator noon lunch at FINZ SEAFOOD & GRILL Pickering Wharf Salem on the water so we can get to know one another over lunch and a few drinks til 1:30PM!...............Yes, I do enjoy FINZ’s famous Buffalo Calamari and the sea food is great here too!..........Note: I called Rockafellas Restaurant and they are not doing there awesome buffet this year Sorry!

1:40 PM We will check out the Orientation Center on Derby Street is talk a walk down the Warf take a photo of the buildings and ships there!

2PM walk down liberty Street and see all the crazy Halloween stuff going on in this Halloween Ally of fun. We’ll visit the Graveyard here for a few minutes. It is cool to see the crowds and the costumes out on the streets

2:40 PM visit the National Park Service Visitor Center in Salem on New Liberty Street is open from 9AM to 5PM, 7 days a week.

3PM The Regional Visitor Center offers a free 27 minute orientation film on the history of Salem and Essex County, Massachusetts, as well as exhibits and information about the area.

3:30 PM for a 2-4PM free Mead tasting at Pamplemousse 185 Essex St Salem, MA (978) 745-2900 (Not far from PEM)

4PM Take a trolley tour ride of Salem for $10 or $20 per person. Does anyone know how to get a discount on these trolley tour rides?

Free time to explore till Dinner!

----------------------New Changes--------------

5:30PM I won Free ticket to Watson Adventures in Salem for their The Haunted Salem Scavenger Hunt so if you want to join me you'll have to pre-buy tickets (cost is $20.50) then print out your pass here
http://www.watsonadventures.com/public/event/the-haunted-salem-scavenger-hunt/

Not sure who want to do this, but if you don't its cool you can hang out at the Carnival or the Haunted Ally Halloween stuff

7PM We’ll regroup at Salem Beer works for dinner, snack and drinks etc also so we can pick up more members from about 7PM to 8PM too. Note I did not pre-reserve a space for us since I have no clue who will still be around for this.

8PM walk the streets of Salem and check out all the craziness going on till about 9PM. I’m leaving around 9PM you can stay later if you wish! . It is cool to see the crowds and the costumes out on the streets.

Enjoy! Ciao Biagio
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet Biagio inside FINZ SEAFOOD & GRILL Pickering Wharf Salem
item.name: Explore Salem on the Sunday before Halloween
